class_notes:
The Fall 2021 BBA Capstone course is intended for seniors who started the BBA Program early/in the Spring.  Non-eligible students will be removed unless they have permission to be enrolled.


The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines. However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class
course_description: Through the Capstone Course experience students will:  1) Practice problem-solving skills in situations characterized by ambiguity and lack of structure, 2) Generate contextually informed, well-researched recommendations that integrate functional area knowledge, and 3) Enhance their capacity to engage in concrete, logistical and grounded analysis.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2754, Section #: 1101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Lowy, Status: Closed
